name: Introduction to Computing
description: Basic concepts of computer systems, including hardware, software, and information processing. Introduction to problem-solving techniques and algorithms using high-level programming languages.

name: Programming Concepts
description: Introduction to programming concepts using a high-level language. Topics include data types, control structures, functions, arrays, and an introduction to object-oriented programming.

name: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Object-oriented design and implementation using a modern OOP language. Topics include classes, inheritance, polymorphism, interfaces, and exception handling.

name: Data Structures
description: Basic data structures and algorithms including lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs. Sorting and searching algorithms. Algorithm analysis and complexity theory.

name: Software Engineering
description: Software development lifecycle: requirements, design, implementation, testing, and maintenance. Project management, documentation, and software quality assurance.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Web frontend/backend development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, server-side programming, and database connectivity. Web application architecture and frameworks.

name: Database Systems
description: Introduction to database concepts, data models, relational database design, normalization, SQL, and database application development. Overview of modern database systems.

name: Data Communication & Networks 1
description: Concepts and principles underlying data communication networks. Network architectures, protocols, routing, and network security fundamentals.

name: Computer Architecture
description: Fundamentals of computer organization and architecture. Topics include digital logic, CPU design, instruction sets, memory hierarchy, and I/O systems.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Development of mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms. Topics include mobile user interfaces, data storage, sensors, and publishing applications.

name: Computer Security
description: Fundamentals of information security. Topics include cryptography, access control, network security, application security, and security management.

name: Operating Systems
description: Fundamental concepts of operating system design and implementation. Process management, memory management, file systems, and device management.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Introduction to cloud computing concepts, architectures, and services. Topics include virtualization, containerization, and deployment of applications in cloud environments.

name: Machine Learning
description: Fundamentals of machine learning algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning approaches.

name: Digital Image Processing
description: Basic concepts and techniques in digital image processing. Topics include image enhancement, restoration, compression, and analysis.
